content: Humans contain enough iron to make a 3 inch nail.
The most common national flag colour is red.
It takes 595 oranges to charge an iphone.
You see better when you're scared.
There's an estimated 5000000000000000000000000000000 bacteria living on earth.
On average, your hair grows 0.4mm per day.
Sophophobia is the fear of learning.
The world's oldest lightbulb has been working since 1901.
A broken heart is known as Takotsubo Cardiomyopathy.
Ancient Egyptians thought hedgehogs cured baldness.
The world's most common word is OK.
